Reviews.Title: Very Nice laptop
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This laptop is quick, responsive and light. It suit my usage very well. The touch screen is vivid. This laptop is great for courcework.

Reviews.Title: Defective Product
Reviews.Author: Estelle Eckstein
Reviews.Content: The Asus product line is probably fine.  The lap top I received was re-furbished and crashed within the first week.  The company did send a full refund which was a huge plus.  I did like the size and the fact it had 10 key.  It is likely a good product.  I would be leery of buying a re-furbished computer though.

ProductInfo.Features:
Asus VivoBook S500CA-RSI5T02 - Windows 8 64-bit
Intel Dual-Core i5-3317U 1.70GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 2.60GHz - 8GB RAM - 500GB (5400rpm) HDD + 24GB SSD
15.6" (1366x768) Touchscreen LED Backlight - Intel HD Graphics 4000 - 802.11 b/g/n - 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet
Webcam - Built-in Speakers -  Built-in Microphone
(1) USB 3.0 - (2) USB 2.0 - (1) HDMI - (1) VGA - (1) Headphone/Microphone Combo Jack - SD Card Reader - Lithium-polymer Battery
ProductInfo.Name: Asus VivoBook S500CA Intel Core i5-3317U 1.70GHz 8GB RAM 500GB HDD + 24GB SSD Webcam Windows 8 64-bit 15.6-inch TOUCHSCREEN
